source.description:
The Docker image or GitHub repository to use for the web service.
@ui kblocks.io/one-of

port.description: The internal HTTP port the container listens on.

route.description: The HTTP/HTTPS route to associate with this web service. All requests to this route will be routed to this service.

rewrite.description: Optionally rewrite the URL path to a different path when requests are routed to this service. For example, say the route is `/api/v2` and the rewrite is `/api`, then requests to `/api/v2/users` will be rewritten to `/api/users`.

host.description: Host name to use for this endpoint

tls.description: TLS configuration for this web service. If provided, the web service will be exposed over HTTPS.

secret.description: Secret name containing the TLS certificate and key to use for this web service

hosts.description: Hostnames to use for this certificate
